name: hourscalc
short_description:
If you don't already know, this script requires you to download Python v2.7.6. It does not work with Python 3.x.x, as a lot of things changed since the update, and many Python scripts are still using v2.7.6.

CURRENT VERSION: v1.1

This script will calculate the total number of hours you worked in EC in order to meet the minimum required number of hours. Just follow the instructions on screen, and the script will print out the total number of hours for you. Easier than calculating it individually!

Note: The current version is 1.1, not 1.0 because I updated the 1.0 code, but accidentally deleted it from both my computer and my storage cloud. Well, who wants to download an old line of code which didn't calculate the weekend hours? （  ノ≧ｘ≦）ノ
summary: A simple "hour calculator" for my work colleagues(and I).
